alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chautauqua County through 1145 PM EDT... At 1036 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles northwest of Westfield to 15 miles north of Northwest Harborcreek to 16 miles northwest of Erie. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fredonia, Westfield, Mayville, Clymer, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua Institution, Lake Erie State Park, Findley Lake, Chautauqua, Portland, Ripley, Stockton, Gerry, Brocton, Mina, Arkwright, French Creek, Sherman, Cassadaga and South Dayton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 60. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall and frequent cloud to ground lightning are also occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
